sentences.sentence: Hi! this is Moonflower, welcome to my space!
sentences.translation: 嗨！大家好！这是我的博客小屋！欢迎常来做客！

sentences.sentence: Moonflower is an annual vine with sweet smelling white flowers that open in the evening.
sentences.translation: 月光花是一种一年生蔓生植物，它在晚上会开有香甜气味的白色花朵。

sentences.sentence: As the Eye of Palpatine passed through the Moonflower Nebula, Callista and Geith boldly tried to destroy the station.
sentences.translation: 当“帕尔·帕廷之眼”穿越月光花星云时，卡莉斯塔和盖特大胆地试图摧毁这个太空站。
